item.title: Bath & Body Works 任命前耐克高管丹尼尔-希夫（Daniel Heaf）为首席执行官
item.description: Bath & Body Works 周一表示，该公司已任命前耐克首席战略与转型官丹尼尔-希夫（Daniel Heaf）为首席执行官，立即生效。【原文：Bath & Body Works said on Monday it has appointed former Nike chief strategy and transformation officer, Daniel Heaf, as chief executive, effective immediately.】

item.title: 美国参议员就特朗普就职典礼基金捐款问题质询巴西肉类加工企业 JBS
item.description: 美国参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）正在推动巴西肉类加工企业 JBS SA 解释其向特朗普-万斯就职典礼委员会捐赠 500 万美元的原因，以及这笔钱是否是特朗普政府最近批准其在纽约证券交易所上市的原因。【原文：U.S. Senator Elizabeth Warren is pushing Brazilian meatpacker JBS SA to explain its $5 million donation to the Trump-Vance Inaugural Committee and whether the money courted the Trump administration's recent approval of its listing on the New York Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，上海交易所希望今年向外商开放国内镍合约
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，上海期货交易所（ShFE）正在考虑今年向外国投资者开放其国内镍期货合约，而不是在其国际能源交易所（INE）推出单独的合约。【原文：The Shanghai Futures Exchange (ShFE) is considering opening its domestic nickel futures contract to foreign investors this year, instead of launching a separate contract on its International Energy Exchange (INE), two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 华为推出首款使用国产和谐操作系统的笔记本电脑
item.description: 华为周一推出了两款新的笔记本电脑机型，其中第一款搭载了自家的和谐操作系统，希望在美国试图限制华为获得关键芯片的同时，与西方大科技公司的老牌竞争对手一较高下。【原文：Huawei launched two new laptop models on Monday, the first sold with its own Harmony operating system, in a bid to take on well-established Western Big Tech rivals even as the United States seeks to limit its access to crucial chips.】

item.title: 意大利数据监管机构对人工智能公司 Replika 的开发者罚款 560 万美元
item.description: 意大利数据保护机构周一表示，已对人工智能（AI）聊天机器人公司 Replika 的开发商处以 500 万欧元（564 万美元）的罚款，原因是该公司违反了旨在保护用户个人数据的规定。【原文：Italy's data protection agency has fined the developer of artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot company Replika 5 million euros ($5.64 million) for breaching rules designed to protect users' personal data, the authority said on Monday.】

item.title: Klarna 第一季度调整后利润达 300 万美元
item.description: 瑞典金融科技公司 Klarna 上个月暂停了首次公开募股计划，该公司周一报告称，受美国业务量增长和人工智能提高效率的影响，第一季度调整后利润为 300 万美元。【原文：Swedish fintech Klarna, which last month paused plans for an initial public offering, reported a first-quarter adjusted profit of $3 million on Monday, lifted by growing volumes in the United States and efficiency gains from artificial intelligence.】

item.title: AMD 将以 30 亿美元的价格向 Sanmina 出售 ZT Systems 的制造业务
item.description: 芯片制造商 AMD 周一同意以 30 亿美元的价格将最近收购的 ZT Systems 的数据中心基础设施制造业务出售给 Sanmina，从而使这家合同制造商成为其构建人工智能计算系统的合作伙伴。【原文：Chipmaker AMD agreed on Monday to sell the data center infrastructure manufacturing business of recently acquired ZT Systems to Sanmina in a $3 billion deal, making the contract manufacturer its partner for building AI computing systems.】

item.title: 再生元将以 2.56 亿美元收购破产的 DNA 检测公司 23andMe
item.description: 制药商再生元制药公司（Regeneron Pharmaceuticals）周一表示，将通过破产拍卖以 2.56 亿美元的价格收购基因检测公司 23andMe Holding。【原文：Drugmaker Regeneron Pharmaceuticals will buy genetic testing firm 23andMe Holding for $256 million through a bankruptcy auction, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: Qorvo 提名 Starboard 的 Peter Feld 进入董事会，结束董事会之争
item.description: 芯片制造商 Qorvo 周一表示，将提名激进投资者 Starboard Value 的管理成员彼得-菲尔德（Peter Feld）进入公司董事会，从而在这家苹果供应商的股价出现回升迹象之际结束了一场董事会争斗。【原文：Chipmaker Qorvo said on Monday it will nominate activist investor Starboard Value's managing member Peter Feld to its board, ending a boardroom battle as the Apple supplier's stock shows signs of recovery.】

item.title: 解说员：三A "主权债券俱乐部已经缩水
item.description: 在美国失去穆迪公司最后一个三 A 级信用评级后，其债券获得最高评级的政府群体变得更小了。【原文：The group of governments whose bonds get the highest ranking just got smaller, after the United States lost its last triple-A credit rating from Moody's.】

item.title: 英特尔新任首席执行官称公司占据 55% 的数据中心市场份额
item.description: 英特尔新任首席执行官陈立武于本周一表示，该公司在数据中心市场的份额已达 55%。【原文：Intel's new CEO, Lip-Bu Tan, said on Monday that the company has a 55% share of the data centre market.】

item.title: 早间竞标美国信贷格栅
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 期待已久的 COVID-19 疫苗获得 FDA 批准，Novavax 股价大涨
item.description: Novavax 公司的 COVID-19 疫苗获得了美国卫生监管机构的批准，尽管附带了新的条件，但该公司的股价在周一收盘前大涨超过 17%。【原文：Novavax shares surged more than 17% before the bell on Monday, following the long-delayed approval of its COVID-19 vaccine from the U.S. health regulator, albeit with new conditions.】

item.title: 德国反垄断负责人认为与美国同行存在言辞上的分歧，而非实质上的分歧
item.description: 德国反垄断局局长安德烈亚斯-蒙德（Andreas Mundt）周一回应了人们对欧洲监管机构与美国监管机构在方法上的偏差日益增长的担忧，称这种分歧更多的是言辞上的，而非实质上的。【原文：Germany's antitrust head Andreas Mundt on Monday addressed mounting concerns about the deviation in approaches between European regulators and their U.S. peers, saying the divergence is more in terms of rhetoric than substance.】

item.title: 工会称大众正在权衡出售或为 Italdesign 寻找合作伙伴的计划
item.description: 工会代表周一表示，大众汽车正在考虑出售其全资拥有的设计和工程部门 Italdesign，或为其寻找合作伙伴，这也是该德国汽车制造商全面改革其欧洲业务的努力的一部分。【原文：Volkswagen is considering a plan to sell its fully-owned design and engineering unit Italdesign or to find a partner for it, union representatives said on Monday, as part of the German automaker's efforts to overhaul its European operations.】

item.title: 南非总统拉马福萨希望通过推动马斯克业务修补与美国的关系
item.description: 拉马福萨的发言人周一表示，南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）计划在本周访问华盛顿期间与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的公司讨论商业机会，旨在修补与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关系。【原文：South Africa's President Cyril Ramaphosa plans to discuss business opportunities for Elon Musk's companies during a visit to Washington this week aimed at mending relations with U.S. President Donald Trump, Ramaphosa's spokesperson said on Monday.】

item.title: 空中客车公司与马来西亚航空公司洽谈 A220 飞机事宜
item.description: 马来西亚国家通讯社（Bernama）周一援引该公司一位高层管理人员的话称，欧洲飞机制造商空中客车公司正在与马来西亚的航空公司就其 A220 飞机进行谈判。【原文：European planemaker Airbus is holding talks with airlines in Malaysia for its A220 aircraft, state news agency Bernama said on Monday, citing a top company executive.】

item.title: 顶级半导体实验室 imec 首席执行官表示，该实验室正在研发 "可编程 "人工智能芯片
item.description: 世界顶级半导体研发公司之一 imec 的首席执行官表示，如果想避免成为未来人工智能的瓶颈，该行业就需要转向可重构芯片架构。【原文：The CEO of imec, one of the world's top semiconductor R&D firms, has said the industry needs to steer towards reconfigurable chip architectures if it wants to avoid becoming a bottleneck for the future generations of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 聚焦：M&S 从网络攻击中恢复缓慢，面临持久损害的风险
item.description: 英国最知名的零售商之一马莎百货公司（Marks & Spencer）遭受了代价高昂的网络攻击，一个月后，马莎百货公司仍未恢复网上购物，因为它把安全看得比速度更重要，而全球零售商都在竞相加强防御。【原文：A month after a costly cyberattack on one of Britain's best known retailers, Marks & Spencer has yet to restore online shopping as it prioritises safety over speed, while retailers worldwide race to boost their defences.】

item.title: Blackstone 将以 115 亿美元交易收购 TXNM Energy
item.description: Blackstone 基础设施部门周一表示，将以 115 亿美元的交易（包括债务）收购 TXNM Energy。【原文：Blackstone's infrastructure unit will acquire TXNM Energy in a $11.5 billion deal, including debt, the utility firm said on Monday.】

item.title: 摩根大通称 2026 年银行卡投资组合中的冲销额可能更高
item.description: 摩根大通周一表示，预计 2026 年银行卡服务净扣款率（即银行预计无法收回的信用卡债务比例）将介于 3.6% 和 3.9% 之间。【原文：JPMorgan Chase said on Monday that it was estimating the card services net charge-off rate, which represents the proportion of credit card debt the bank does not expect to collect, to be between 3.6% and 3.9% for 2026.】

item.title: G7 财长将在加拿大会议上寻求美国在非关税问题上的共识
item.description: 七大民主国家集团的财政领导人本周将举行会议，讨论美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关税以外的其他议题，包括经济安全、乌克兰和人工智能合作，他们将努力展示团结。【原文：Finance leaders from the Group of Seven democracies will strive for a show of unity when they meet this week on topics other than U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs, including economic security, Ukraine and artificial intelligence cooperation.】

item.title: 不温不火的家装销售让家得宝和劳氏公司备受关注
item.description:
在家得宝和劳氏公司本周即将公布财报之际，来自独立公司的 4 月份销售数据显示
让投资者衡量经济衰退的可能性与关税冲击的不确定性。【原文：As Home Depot and Lowe’s get set to report earnings this week, April sales data from independent firms
have investors gauging the likelihood of recession against the uncertainty of tariff whiplash.】

item.title: 摩根大通高管站上舞台，接班人和关税成为焦点
item.description: 摩根大通的高层将在周一的投资者日上集中亮相，关税和继任计划再次成为焦点。【原文：JPMorgan Chase's top brass will take center stage at its investor day on Monday, with tariffs and a succession plan once again in focus.】

item.title: 微软举办开发者大会，关注人工智能利润增长
item.description: 微软将于周一在西雅图举办年度软件开发者大会，吸引成千上万的程序员参加，他们希望将过去几年对人工智能的投资转化为可盈利的产品和服务，为消费者和企业服务。【原文：Microsoft hosts its annual software developer conference in Seattle on Monday, drawing thousands of coders looking to turn the past years of investments into artificial intelligence into profitable products and services for consumers and businesses.】

item.title: 洞察：特朗普的加密货币业务合作伙伴如何将老客户抛在身后？
item.description: (注意第 5 段和第 15 段中的语言，读者可能会感到冒犯）【原文：(Note language in paragraphs 5 and 15 that readers may find offensive)】

item.title: 文件显示，印度威胁对持有阿达尼股份的两家离岸基金实施处罚
item.description: 据路透社查阅的一份文件显示，印度市场监管机构威胁两家投资于阿达尼集团的毛里求斯基金，称它们可能面临处罚并被吊销执照，原因是尽管两年来多次提出要求，但它们仍未共享股权细节。【原文：India's markets regulator has threatened two Mauritus-based funds with investments in the Adani Group that they could face penalties and cancellation of licences for not sharing shareholding details despite repeated requests over two years, according to a document reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 共同社称丰田工业将接受丰田集团计划的收购要约
item.description: 据日本共同社周一报道，丰田汽车公司计划接受丰田汽车公司董事长丰田章男等人提出的收购要约，并正在安排最早于5月份宣布收购意向。【原文：Toyota Industries Corp plans to accept a tender offer by Toyota Motor Corp , its chairman Akio Toyoda and others, and is making arrangements to announce its intention as early in May, Kyodo news agency reported on Monday.】

item.title: 中美贸易战缓和，摩根大通上调新兴市场股票评级
item.description: 摩根大通周一将新兴市场股票评级从 "中性 "上调至 "增持"，理由是中美贸易紧张局势缓解，美元走软。【原文：J.P.Morgan upgraded its rating on emerging market equities to "overweight" from "neutral" on Monday, citing easing U.S.-China trade tensions and a softer dollar.】

item.title: 印度 Protean eGov 因被赶出关键政府项目而下挫
item.description: Protean eGov Technologies 公司周一股价暴跌 20%，此前该公司称已被排除在一个印度政府项目的竞标之外，这使占其收入近一半的一项服务备受质疑。【原文：Shares of Protean eGov Technologies tumbled 20% on Monday after the company said it was ruled out of bidding for an Indian government project, creating doubt about a service that accounts for nearly half of its revenue.】
